sentences.en: But we have the same problem in UK.
sentences.cn: 而在我们英国，也有同样的问题。

sentences.en: Check out our website at www.cobuild.collins.co.uk.
sentences.cn: 请登录我们的网站www.cobuild.collins.co.uk查看。

sentences.en: Entry to this prize draw is limited to UK residents.
sentences.cn: 这次抽奖只限英国公民参加。

sentences.en: For details visit our website at www.cobuild.collins.co.uk.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情，请访问我们的网站www.cobuild.collins.co.uk。

sentences.en: He sees no signs of improvement in the UK and continental economy.
sentences.cn: 他看不到英国与欧洲大陆经济好转的迹象。

sentences.en: In the medium term the UK car industry has a brighter outlook.
sentences.cn: 从中期来看，英国汽车行业前景将会更好。

sentences.en: In the UK visible imports have traditionally been greater than visible exports.
sentences.cn: 在英国，传统上有形产品的进口一直大于出口。

sentences.en: In the UK, 254,000 homes are cabled.
sentences.cn: 在英国，有254,000户住户安装了有线电视。

sentences.en: It claims to be the most popular television station in the UK.
sentences.cn: 它自称是英国最受欢迎的电视台。

sentences.en: It is indisputable that birds in the UK are harbouring this illness.
sentences.cn: 无可争辩的是，英国的鸟类携带着这种疾病的病菌。

sentences.en: It is not known if they will return to the UK for the birth.
sentences.cn: 现在还不知道他们是否会为了孩子的出生而回到英国。

sentences.en: The average UK coal seam is one metre thick.
sentences.cn: 英国煤层的平均厚度为1米。

sentences.en: The oil company jousts with Esso for lead position in UK sales.
sentences.cn: 这家石油公司和埃索公司角逐英国市场销量的榜首位置。

sentences.en: This company is the biggest wine e-tailer in the UK.
sentences.cn: 这家公司是英国最大的网络葡萄酒零售商。

sentences.en: UK companies face a stark choice if they want to stay competitive.
sentences.cn: 英国公司如果想要保持竞争力就不得不面对严峻的选择。

sentences.en: UK employment law embodies arbitration and conciliation mechanisms for settling industrial disputes.
sentences.cn: 英国雇佣法包括解决劳资纠纷的仲裁和调解机制。

sentences.en: UK trading profits were pegged at £40 million.
sentences.cn: 英国的贸易利润固定在4,000万英镑。

sentences.en: What does that mean for those at the very bottom in the UK?
sentences.cn: 对那些在英国处于社会底层的人来说这意味着什么呢？

trans.tran_cn: 联合王国（the United Kingdom），英国
